name: The Florescence Pattern
description:
The Florescence Pattern

GoGodotJam entry   - Theme:  Growth

Puzzle game in which the game assets increase as you progress; the playing field, the number of pieces, the number of correct selections required, etc.

This is my first game I've made that I didn't follow along a tutorial.  I'm interested in education via gaming and wanted to try my hand at game development.  This is my first game.   I hope that it helps promote healthy brain activities and serves to improve spatial recognition, memory, and logic.

I've never published a game before so I just used the default templates from Godot.  I wasn't able to test the Linux or Mac files...so I hope they work.  If they don't, I'm sorry, I tried.  I'll look into this more in the future.

I hope you enjoy it!
